name: reckless
caption: Reckless

effect.short: Strengthens recoil moves to 1.2× their power.
effect.full:
This Pokémon's recoil moves and crash moves have 1.2× their base power.

[]{move:struggle} is unaffected.

The "crash moves" are the moves that damage the user upon missing: []{move:jump-kick} and []{move:high-jump-kick}.

flavorText: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
